METHOD.NAME: Consulta
METHOD.ACTIONSCRIPT: SELECT G.GRADE, #ROWSET("SELECT:TAMANHOS T.TAMANHO, T.DESC_TAMANHO, QT.PERC_DIST AS QIX_PERC_DIST FROM TAMANHOS T LEFT JOIN QIX_TAMANHOS QT ON QT.GRADE = T.GRADE AND QT.TAMANHO = T.TAMANHO WHERE T.GRADE=:WTSSYS_OBJECT") FROM GRADES G WHERE G.GRADE =:WTSSYS_OBJECT;
